config.xenyria_eem.discord.rp.tooltip: When enabled your current activity on the Xenyria Server gets shared on Discord.
config.xenyria_eem.discord.details.toolt: When enabled stats from your current game get shared on Discord. 'Rich Presence' has to be enabled for this to work.
config.xenyria_eem.paintsquad.swim_cam.t: When enabled your camera automatically switches into third-person view when entering the swim form.
config.xenyria_eem.paintsquad.shooting.t: Greatly reduces shoot-detection delay for chargers and other weapons.
